|flash1type = SPI NOR |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Macronix;MX66L1G45GMI-10G; |flash1size = 128 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->

}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "Model:P17457-03", "FG-51E", "Fortinet, Inc", :"19K-W13-6900R RoHs", and "WRTM-320N_V02" are silkscreened on board.
OEM: [[Gemtek]] WRTM-320N (V02)
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: [[Marvell]] 88F6820 ''Armada 385'' :Dual-Core ARM (Cortex-A9) @1.6GHz *Storage: 128MB SPI (NOR) Flash *Memory: 2GB (DDR3) SDRAM *Network: 7x GbE ports *USB: 1x USB 3.0 port *Power Source: 12V/3A via 2-pin Molex
==Links of Interest== *[https://www.fortinet.com/content/dam/fortinet/assets/data-sheets/FortiGate_FortiWiFi_50E_Series.pdf Data Sheet] *[https://www.corporatearmor.com/fortigate-50e/fortigate-50e-lets-take-a-closer-look/ ''FortiGate 50E – Let’s take a closer look'' on '''Corporate Armor'''] *[https://www.networkstraining.com/fortigate-comparison-30e-50e-60e/ ''Fortinet Fortigate 30E vs 50E/51E vs 60E/61E/60F'' on '''Networks Training''']
